Upcoming Events.name: February 2013 Networking Event
Upcoming Events.description: We bring together a wide variety of immigrant serving agencies and churches to bring you this insprining and encouraging event.
event location: Marlborough Community Centre - 6021 Madigan Drive N.E. Calgary
Upcoming Events.contact: Registration begins at 8:45 a.m. Cost: $15 pre-registered $20 at the door
